page.title: 05HOMELIFE - MY PETS
page.content: MY NAME IS YVONNE JEFFREY AND I LIVE AT 51 LANGDEN CRESCENT, BAMBER BRIDGE. I HAVE TWO DOGS - ONE IS A MONGREL WHOSE NAME IS 'SANDY' AND SHE IS ABOUT SEVEN YEARS OLD. THE OTHER IS A YORKSHIRE TERRIER CALLED 'PIP' AND HE IS TWELVE MONTHS OLD. MY BROTHER ALSO HAS A DOG OF HIS OWN AND WE HAVE TWO TERRAPINS AND A TANKFUL OF FISH. WHEN MY MUM WAS YOUNG SHE HAD A BLACK MONGREL CALLED 'WHISKY'. SOME PEOPLE HAVE UNUSUAL PETS SUCH AS SNAKES,LIZARDS AND EVEN GOLDFISH WE DON'T HAVE ANYTHING LIKE THAT AND FIND DOGS BETTER PETS AND EASIER TO LOOK AFTER. IF YOU GIVE A DOG A LOT OF AFFECTION AND PLENTY OF EXERCISE, HE WILL REPAY YOU TENFOLD AND BE A GOOD COMPANION FOR YOU ALL OF HIS LIFE. WE LOVE OUR DOGS VERY MUCH AND KNOW THAT THEY LOVE US.
